ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, And well me John.  You say you have a vast knowledge of Kunark?? well, maybe you can help me.  I have a lvl 9 half-elf bard and he is stuck respawning in
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, And well me John. You say you have a vast
knowledge of Kunark?? well, maybe you can help me. I
have a lvl 9 half-elf bard and he is stuck respawning
in the arena, both surrounding zones are empty, but,
whenever I try to leave Rathetear Lake I always meet
up with some gnoll shamans and get slaughtered....
One might ask how in all the worlds I got a lvl 9 bard
safely to The Arena, Lets just say I abused SoW a
little, I was spawning in Qeynos, and was trying to
reach Freeport, and got lost somewhere in the
middle... Any assistance in theis matter would be
greatly appreciated,
Stauchnad Tier Ss'Faleen
Lowly Bard with big dreams.

--- John <kamorm@...> wrote:
> Hail,
>
> I have been at this stoopid game for close to 3
> years. My crowning
> achievement so far (150 days played, cause I love to
> 'smell the
> flowers') is lvl 60 epiced shaman with complete
> spellbook
> (no 'Ancient Scrolls' yet) and 25 AA pts. Even after
> playing EQ for
> this amount of time there is so much I am unfamiliar
> with, mostly the
> old world, feel like newbie often :)
>
> I do however have humble knowledge of the Barbarian
> Shaman class, the
> continent of Antonica and many of the kunark and
> velious zones. I
> hang out mostly in luclin zones atm. I belong to a
> smallish guild (60
> members) that I have been in for 2 years (since
> early 30's) we are
> just now approaching some of the higher end
> encounters.
>
> I know I will learn from you folks and hopefully be
> able to
> contribute in some humble manner.
>
> Kamorm Winterstalker
> Oralce of Coinfist
> Innoruuk Server
>
>
